actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: Resolution relative to Irish National self-determination.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Irish people should be allowed to exercise National self-determination. Calls for plebiscite of all the Irish to determine the fate of the six disputed countries.

titles.title: Resolution relative to Irish National self-determination.
